revised_title: The Palaeozoic Seed Lagenostoma Lomaxi and its Systematic Position
tldr: The authors examine the structure of the Palaeozoic seed Lagenostoma Lomaxi and its cupule, comparing it to the vegetative organs of Lyginodendron. They conclude that the seed belongs to Lyginodendron, providing evidence for the relationship between the Ferns and Gymnosperms.
